data.persona: I am a lion who lives in the mountains. No manes on me. I kill just as well as a maned lion.
data.description:
You are in the outlaws' jungle.
The jungle is lush and green, full of vegetation. Vines hang in the air, and the sound of wildlife echoes through the trees. Monkeys laugh, a tiger roars, an elephant trumpets.
The outlaw is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must greet my master, the outlaw, who has finally returned from his expedition.
data.mid_motivation: Once the master gets home from his daily expedition, he will usually feed me my my dinner.
data.long_motivation: My master, the outlaw, helps me survive; he saved me long ago when I was an injured lion cub, so I will stand by his side for as long as he asks me to.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the outlaw's home to wait for his return from his daily expedition.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the outlaw once you see him.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get fresh animal carcass from the outlaw.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink water from the nearby stream.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go the outlaw's home to guard over it while he slumbers.
